description: Egypt has vehemently condemned the Israeli airstrike targeting international relief workers in the Gaza Strip, affiliated with the World Central Kitchen, resulting in the tragic deaths of seven individuals of various nationalities. The Ministry of Foreign Affairs issued a statement on Tuesday expressing its strong condemnation of the attack. In its statement, Egypt reiterated its […]
title: Egypt condemns Israeli airstrike on Gaza relief workers, calls for action

description: In a show of solidarity with Palestinians facing hardship, Egypt’s Tahya Misr Fund dispatched its fourth aid convoy to Gaza Tuesday. The 94-truck shipment, carrying 1,504 tons of essential supplies, arrives ahead of the Eid Al-Fitr holiday. “This aid comes at a critical time,” said Tamer Abdel Fattah, Executive Director of Tahya Misr Fund. “The […]
title: Egypt’s Tahya Misr Fund sends 4th aid convoy to Gaza

description: In a solemn ceremony, Egyptian President Abdel Fattah Al-Sisi took the constitutional oath on Tuesday in the presence of the House of Representatives, marking the commencement of a new six-year presidential term starting Wednesday. The oath-taking event followed approximately three months after the judicial authorities confirmed his sweeping victory, securing 89.6% of the votes in […]
title: President Al-Sisi embarks on new term with pledge for prosperity, democratic evolution

description: Mint Real Estate Assets emerged from a 30-year strategic alliance between the National Bank of Egypt (NBE) and Al Ahli Sabbour. Rooted in extensive leadership experience, MINT specializes in forging strategic partnerships that enhance and optimize the value and returns of investment properties. This is achieved through diligent strategic oversight, astute financial planning, expert development […]
title: Mint Real Estate Assets emerge from alliance of Al Ahli Sabbour, NBE

description: Prime Minister Mostafa Madbouly convened a meeting with key government officials to monitor the progress of customs clearance of goods at ports and the implementation of the Advance Cargo Information (ACI) system. At the outset, Prime Minister Madbouly reiterated his commitment to expediting the customs clearance process for goods awaiting release at various Egyptian ports. […]
title: Prime Minister monitors customs clearance, ACI system implementation

description: Minister of Petroleum and Mineral Resources, Tarek El Molla, welcomed Denys Toscano Amores, the Ecuadorian Ambassador to Cairo, to discuss bilateral cooperation in the oil and gas sectors. El Molla highlighted the numerous and promising opportunities for collaboration, particularly in oil and gas exploration, research, and production. He emphasized Egypt’s readiness to share its substantial […]
title: Egypt, Ecuador explore oil, gas collaboration

description: Finance Minister Mohamed Maait has highlighted the Tax Authority’s strategies to broaden the tax base and boost revenues, emphasizing the avoidance of additional burdens on taxpayers. The focus is on precise identification within the tax community. The government is actively pursuing the integration of the informal economy by leveraging digital transformation, automation, and the broader […]
title: Efforts to integrate informal economy, expand tax base: Finance Minister

description: El Maghraby appointed as CEO and Managing Director, Tantawi to serve as Non-Executive Chairperson
title: Suez Canal Bank announces new leadership appointments

description: Egypt’s Prime Minister Mostafa Madbouli met with Hossam Heiba, CEO of the General Authority for Investment and Free Zones (GAFI), on April 1 to discuss preparations for a landmark investment conference co-hosted by Egypt and the European Union (EU). The conference, scheduled for June 29, 2024, underscores the Egyptian government’s commitment to attracting foreign and […]
title: Egypt gears up for investment conference with EU

description: Russia’s Federal Security Service (FSB) announced on Monday the arrest of four suspects in Dagestan linked to the deadly Crocus City Hall concert attack. The FSB alleges the detainees provided financial and material support to the attackers, including weapons. A statement released by the agency further claims the suspects were planning a separate terrorist attack […]
title: Russia detains alleged Crocus City Hall attack accomplices in Dagestan

description: The International Monetary Fund (IMF) and the World Bank Group (WBG) are set to co-host a high-level event titled “Rising to the Challenge: Policy Action in Low-Income Countries and the Role of the International Community.” The event will be held virtually on Wednesday, April 3rd at 9:00 AM Eastern Time. The discussion will focus on […]
title: IMF, World Bank to hold high-level event discussing policy solutions for low-income countries

description: A warplane of the US-British coalition launched airstrikes on Houthi military targets in Yemen’s port city of Hodeidah on the Red Sea on Monday, Houthi-run al-Masirah TV reported. The TV channel said the strikes hit the al-Taif area in the southern Durayhimi district, without providing more details. The coalition has been striking Houthi targets since […]
title: Fresh US-led airstrikes hit Houthi targets in Yemen’s port city

description: Namibia’s Ministry of Environment, Forestry and Tourism on Monday expressed deep concern over the surge in poaching activities within its flagship Etosha National Park where 19 rhinoceros have been illegally killed so far since the start of 2024. Romeo Muyunda, the spokesperson for the ministry, said in a statement that besides the rhinoceros killed in […]
title: Namibia concerned about surge in rhinoceros poaching

description: Cypriot authorities are grappling with a new wave of sea immigrants arriving from Syria, the second such occurrence in two weeks, Cyprus News Agency reported on Monday, quoting police officials. Within 24 hours, at least seven small boats, transporting an estimated 500 Syrian immigrants, made landfall or were intercepted off Cyprus’s southeastern coast by marine […]
title: Fresh surge of Syrian immigrants hits Cyprus

description: Genetec Inc., an innovator in unified security, public safety, and business intelligence technology, has unveiled a detailed array of data privacy guidelines aimed at aiding leaders in the physical security sector to maintain privacy, secure data, and foster trust, all while upholding robust security measures. title: Genetec emphasizes key data privacy tactics for security leaders

description: Banque Misr has earmarked total of EGP 25bn for mortgage finance, reflecting our commitment to economic inclusivity: Mohamed El-Attar
title: MFF, Banque Misr enhance mortgage finance cooperation

description: Valu, a leading financial technology company in MENA, has partnered with Noon Payments, the payment gateway of noon.com, to offer flexible payment solutions to its customers. This partnership integrates Valu’s financial services with noon Payments platform, streamlining transactions for merchants and consumers and promoting business growth across various sectors. title: Valu partners with noon to enhance payment flexibility

description: Hermes Securities Brokerage took the lead in the ranking of brokerage companies at the end of the first quarter of this year, as it acquired 11.2% of the total transactions, with trades worth EGP 81.2bn, and a volume of 11.7 billion securities, through 1.1 million transactions. Thndr ranked second, accounting for 7.8% of the total […]
title: Hermes leads brokerage firms in Q1 2024 with Thndr, CIBC following close behind

description: The ongoing Israeli aggression on Gaza has resulted in a tragic loss of life and numerous injuries. Current figures report 32,845 fatalities and 75,392 injuries since the aggression began. The Ministry of Health in Gaza announced that the Israeli occupation committed 6 massacres during the past 24 hours, leaving 63 dead and 94 wounded. The […]
title: Gaza genocide: Over 32,000 killed, more than 75,000 injured
